title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy – 2022 Statement on the Situation in Ukraine (14/11/2022)
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, on 14 November 2022.
content:
Good health to you, fellow Ukrainians!
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

It is Sunday today. I’m in my office together with our team. The Office is working, Kyiv doesn’t stop, the country works non-stop. Look around – there are always people fighting and working without weekends for the sake of our victory.
